content:

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Marina District at 9:00AM. Charles will be at Bayview from 11:30AM to 2:30PM. You'd like to meet Charles for a minimum of 45 minutes. Robert will be at Sunset District from 4:45PM to 9:00PM. You'd like to meet Robert for a minimum of 30 minutes. Karen will be at Richmond District from 7:15PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Karen for a minimum of 60 minutes. Rebecca will be at Nob Hill from 4:15PM to 8:30PM. You'd like to meet Rebecca for a minimum of 90 minutes. Margaret will be at Chinatown from 2:15PM to 7:45PM. You'd like to meet Margaret for a minimum of 120 minutes. Patricia will be at Haight-Ashbury from 2:30PM to 8:30PM. You'd like to meet Patricia for a minimum of 45 minutes. Mark will be at North Beach from 2:00PM to 6:30PM. You'd like to meet Mark for a minimum of 105 minutes. Melissa will be at Russian Hill from 1:00PM to 7:45PM. You'd like to meet Melissa for a minimum of 30 minutes. Laura will be at Embarcadero from 7:45AM to 1:15PM. You'd like to meet Laura for a minimum of 105 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.

SOLUTION: Here's the optimized meeting schedule that maximizes the number of friends you can meet while respecting all constraints and minimum meeting durations:

```json
{
  "itinerary": [
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Laura",
      "start_time": "09:00",
      "end_time": "10:45"
    },
    {
      "action": "travel",
      "from": "Marina District",

    },
    {

      "end_time": "12:15"
    },
    {
      "action": "travel",
      "from": "Bayview",
      "to": "Chinatown",
      "start_time": "12:15",
      "end_time": "12:34"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Margaret",
      "start_time": "14:15",
      "end_time": "16:15"
    },
    {
      "action": "travel",
      "from": "Chinatown",
      "to": "Nob Hill",
      "start_time": "16:15",
      "end_time": "16:21"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Rebecca",
      "start_time": "16:21",
      "end_time": "17:51"
    },
    {
      "action": "travel",
      "from": "Nob Hill",
      "to": "Sunset District",
      "start_time": "17:51",
      "end_time": "18:15"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Robert",
      "start_time": "18:15",
      "end_time": "18:45"
    },
    {
      "action": "travel",
      "from": "Sunset District",
      "to": "Richmond District",
      "start_time": "18:45",
      "end_time": "18:57"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Karen",
      "start_time": "19:15",
      "end_time": "20:15"
    }
  ]
}
```

This schedule meets all minimum duration requirements and includes meetings with:
1. Laura (105 min)
2. Charles (45 min)
3. Margaret (120 min)
4. Rebecca (90 min)
5. Robert (30 min)
6. Karen (60 min)

The schedule accounts for travel times between locations and respects all time constraints. Some friends couldn't be included (Patricia, Mark, Melissa) due to time conflicts with higher-priority/longer meetings. The itinerary prioritizes meetings with longer minimum duration requirements first.
